defaultsMap:
app_name PartyApp //PARTY crash_info Application crash detected crash_message Something needs to be fixed! We collected the crash report and we will fix it. //Splash new_update_title A New Update is Available new_update_required Please update the app to the new version. update Update playStore_redirect_url market://details?id=ysrtp.party.app //Login login Login hint_name Name hint_mobile Mobile name_required Enter your name hint_district District hint_constituency Assembly Constituency hint_panchayat Gram Panchayat hint_block Block/Municipality/NAC register Register name_min_char Name should be minimum 3 characters mobile_required Enter your mobile number mobile_invalid Invalid mobile number mobile_digits Mobile number should be 10 digits district_required Select your district constituency_required Enter your constituency block_required Enter your Block/Municipality/NAC panchayat_required Enter your panchayat select_district Select your district select_constituency Select your constituency select_block Select your block select_panchayat Select your gram panchayat ward_required Enter your ward number referred_by Party friend mobile referred_by_color #00FFFFFF referred_required Friend Mobile number should be 10 digits referred_title Who encouraged you to install Party App? referred_hint Please enter the person’s mobile number tv_tnc By clicking Register, you agree to our terms and that you have read our Privacy Policy //WebView title_privacy Privacy Policy new_mla_postings New Posting //Network no_connection_error No Connection Error allow_network_access Please allow network access to Party app. auth_failure_error Auth Failure Error server_error Server Error network_error Network Error parse_error Parse Error timeout_error Timeout Error pic_upload_failed Failed to upload profile picture to server.Try again later network_connected Connected to network network_not_connected No internet connection //Verify Otp verify_otp Verify OTP otp_required Enter valid OTP enter_otp_text Please enter OTP that has been sent to your mobile number :mobile hint_enter_otp Enter OTP here submit Submit resend Resend OTP sms_header ODParty navigation_drawer_open Open navigation drawer navigation_drawer_close Close navigation drawer //Home send_to Share with liked Liked like Like social_media Social Media share_app Share App reward Reward
(బహుమతి) alert_title Welcome to YSRTP App alert_info Be the agent of development. Please SHARE 'New Posts' on your 3 social media platforms- Facebook, Twitter and WhatsApp and promote YSRTP's growth story. //Rewards reward_conditions (బహుమతి) Reward conditions title_rewards Reward Conditions share_now (Share Now) new_article_count Rewards //New Posts Fragment storage_permission Allow Storage access permission to continue. no_new_posts Thank you for Sharing latest_articles_count new posts received // Unshared Posts Fragment no_unshared_posts Be the agent of development. Please SHARE 'New Posts' on your 3 social media platforms- Facebook, Twitter and WhatsApp and promote YSRTP's growth story. // Shared Posts Fragment no_shared_posts Be the agent of development. Please SHARE 'New Posts' on your 3 social media platforms- Facebook, Twitter and WhatsApp and promote YSRTP's growth story. title_share_on Please share on title_share_on_all Please share this article title_all_shared Well Done. Thanks for Sharing install_facebook Install Facebook application to share install_twitter Install Twitter application to share install_whatsapp Install WhatsApp application to share //Share Dialog already_shared_on You already shared on share_on Please share on // Notifications no_notifications No messages available //FeedBack comments_required Your feedback is required min_comments_required Minimum feedback is required // My Profile logout_confirmation Are you sure you want to logout? info Confirm logout error_occured Error Occurred my_profile My Profile notifications Messages feedback Feedback title_camera_profile Select an option to upload new_posts New Posts shared_posts Shared Posts unshared_posts Partially Shared press_back_to_exit Press once again to exit! notification_topic test session_expired You have logged in from another device. Please login again no_new_mla_posts Create your first YSRTP post test local //Social Links party_social_link_1 https://www.facebook.com/YSRTelanganaParty/ party_social_link_2 https://twitter.com/YSRTelangana party_social_link_3 http://ysrtelangana.com/ party_social_link_icon_1 https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c2/Facebook_icon_192.png party_social_link_icon_2 https://ecfr.eu/wp-content/uploads/Twitter_logo_round_transp.png party_social_link_icon_3 https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/ee/WWW_icon_-_Digital_Preservation.png leader_social_link_1 https://www.facebook.com/IMSharmilaReddy/ leader_social_link_2 https://twitter.com/realyssharmila leader_social_link_3 https://www.instagram.com/realyssharmila/?hl=en leader_social_link_icon_1 https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c2/Facebook_icon_192.png leader_social_link_icon_2 https://ecfr.eu/wp-content/uploads/Twitter_logo_round_transp.png leader_social_link_icon_3 https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a5/Instagram_icon.png/240px-Instagram_icon.png
